display.title: Reinforcing Trimmed Armor
display.description: Throw a piece of Trimmed Armor and a Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template into the centre of a Deepslate Furnace to enhance it's Material Attributes, replacing it's current Pattern [Required: 1x Any Trimmed Armor Piece 1x Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template | Drop Craft With: Deepslate Furnace]
